short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate HIPAAtizer's HIPAA-Compliant Forms with Practice Fusion, Electronic Health Record (EHR) Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HIPAA-Compliant Online Forms For Practice Fusion Users.

Looking to integrate your customized intake and other forms with Practice Fusion in a fully HIPAA-Compliant manner? With HIPAAtizer, you can securely transition your customized intake forms online. HIPAAtizer converts your paper and PDF forms into HIPAA-Compliant online forms that are mobile and desktop friendly. Patients can conveniently fill out forms at home, or in your office on a tablet, and the information is securely pushed to your Practice Fusion account. Plus, HIPAAtizer maintains your existing form styles and printable PDF templates, saving you time when you’re reviewing patient submissions.

The HIPAAtizer-Practice Fusion forms are compatible with various devices, including iPads, allowing for easy in-office use and immediate access to results in your preferred format.

HIPAAtizer’s HIPAA-Compliant form builder offers various features, including a summing function to automatically calculate scores for assessments like GAD-7, PHQ-9, PHQ-15, ORT and AUDIT. For more information on HIPAAtizer’s features, visit https://www.hipaatizer.com/
